ca.ubc.cs.cpsc211.photo
Class PhotoManager

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.cs.cpsc211.photo.PhotoManager

public class PhotoManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class that manages a collection of albums, and thereby also a collection of photos. To add/remove photos in this collection, simply add/remove them in the albums.
